EXTRACTED VALUE: Finally a lag-free online shooter! A shame it comes at the expense of the Campaign.
Though it's not the best free-roaming game ever made, it's easily the best movie-based game in history and pays tribute to the Don with great respect.
If you're into tennis games then Top Spin 2 comes highly recommended, just don't expect a completely upgraded game.
Tony Hawk's Proving Ground does many things right, but frustrating goals and unrefined gameplay mechanics seriously dampen the experience.
Be A Pro's sideshow trumps the main event, which itself is largely unchanged. [Issue#32, p.86]
The second-best ice hockey game on the 360. You know what the best one is, so go buy it. [Issue 26, p.99]
Ridge Racer 6's graphics may be pure 360 shininess, but the gameplay is from a generation ago... hell, two generations ago and that's generous.
However if you want to go solo into a new gaming experience, this is no Army of One.
You find yourself in a game resembling a mix of Fable and Pikmin.
The single-player game, while damn hard, is also fun. Shame it's just another Xbox port really [Issue#6, p.97]
